definitions.title: 1. a.
definitions.body: together with, Da 2:18, Da 2:43, Da 7:13 [[עִם־עֲנׇנֵי שְׁמַיׇּא]], Ezr 5:2 +; whose dwelling, portion, etc., is with Da 2:11, Da 2:22, Da 4:12, Da 5:21.

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: to speak with Da 6:22, to make war with Da 7:21; to do with ( = towards) 3:32 [[דִּי עֲבַד עִמִּי]] (cf. Ps 86:17), cf. Ezr 6:8; [[שַׁוִּי עִם]] to make like to Da 6:21. †
of time, Da 3:33 = Da 4:31 [[עִם־דָּר וְדָר]] (co-exists) with all generations (cf. BH
